text: Passage to Marseille is a 1944 American World War II adventure movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was 1942 novel Sans Patrie (Men Without Country) by Charles Nordhoff and James Norman Hall. It stars Humphrey Bogart, Claude Rains, Mich√®le Morgan, Philip Lorre, George Tobias, Sydney Greenstreet, Helmut Dantine, Victor Francen and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 war movies Category:1944 adventure movies Category:1940s American adventure movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: Passage to Marseille
